trends: There have been 10 other sightings in Bensalem
There were no other sightings in Bensalem on or around March 5th 2003
Summary: Dome shaped craft changed shape to triangle
divs: Sighting DetailsDriving along I95 towards Bensalem, Pa we saw an object hover change directions,change shape and light patterns. The final shape was triangle with three whitelights on each point and a red light in the center. It disguised itself severaltimes and also changed light patterns. Seen many more objects throughout thenight while drving around lower bucks. Maybe a fleet following us aroundRecieved and channeled telepathic communication from entity on board. Seemed tobe studying us and I asked it why and who they were. They said they werestudying our civilization and that they had lived likeus once but destroyedthemsleves. They were worried about a coming war and wanted us to stop it butsaid in the end we were going to wipe ourselves out by nuclear war. They showedme the future. They said they travel the speed of light and can travel throughtime and throughout dimensions. They said we will evolve into what they areafter a nuclear holocaust.
